overview: This Tabu biopic gives an honest, behind-the-scenes look at the ups and downs in the 20 years of the band. It tells the stories that have inspired some of their biggest in a long list of hits. It takes you backstage, painting the first truly honest portraits of the band members. Additional insights into their music are provided by their colleagues from the world of music, who consider Tabu a major player in the music scene.
title: Tabu - Story for Tomorrow
